question1: ^I am glad that I can help again!
^Is there another waiter or waitress in the cafe?
^What do you think of your employer?
^I have no more questions for you. Thank you

answer1: ^Oh, yes. There was another waiter here before.
^But poor Jack got fired for sending the wrong coffee.
^The customer had a severe allergic reaction from that wrongly served coffee.
^I thought that was bad until this happened...
answer2: ^No, I think. This was the first time I saw him in the cafe.
^I heard his complaints about the coffee...
answer3: ^Oh...Mr Lollas is not very easy to get along with sometimes...
^He got mad at me all the time, for all the trivial things.

b: ^I only know I have nothing to do with it.

answer3version2: ^Maybe you would like to know that I encountered the owner in the bathroom just now.
^I don't know what he was doing with his apron in the bathroom.
answer4: ^I only know I have nothing to do with it.
